All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Card
Represents a single card in the Uno game.

CardEffectManager
Manages special card effects in the UNO game.
Deck
Represents a deck of Uno cards.
DrawFourEffect
Represents the effect of a "+4" card in the UNO game.
DrawTwoEffect
Represents the effect of a "+2" card in the UNO game.
EISCUnoEnum
Enum EISCUnoEnum This enum represents the various file paths for the images used in the EISC Uno game.
EmptyDeckException
Custom exception thrown when an attempt is made to draw a card from an empty UNO deck.
EndGameUnoController
Controller responsible for handling the behavior at the end of the UNO game.
GameUno
Represents a game of Uno.
GameUnoController
Controller class for the Uno game.
GameUnoStage
Represents the main stage of the Uno game application.
GameUnoState
Represents the complete state of an UNO game, including the deck, table, players, turn information, and blocked statuses.
ICardEffect
Interface for implementing special card effects.
IGameEventListener
 
IGameUno
Interface representing the Uno game functionality.
IllegalGameStateException
Custom runtime exception thrown when the UNO game enters an illegal or inconsistent state.
InvalidCardPlayException
Custom exception thrown when a player attempts to play an invalid card that does not follow the rules of the UNO game.
IPlaneTextFileHandler
Interface that defines the contract for reading from and writing to plain text files.
IPlayer
Interface representing a player in the Uno game.
ISerializableFileHandler
Interface for handling serialization and deserialization of objects to and from files.
Main
The main class of the EISC Uno application.
PlaneTextFileHandler
Implements the IPlaneTextFileHandler interface to provide basic functionality for reading from and writing to plain text files.
Player
Represents a player in the Uno game.
Prototype<T>
Interfaz para el patrÃ³n Prototype
ReverseEffect
Represents the effect of a "REVERSE" card in the UNO game.
SerializableFileHandler
Implementation of ISerializableFileHandler for serializing and deserializing objects to and from files using Java's built-in serialization mechanism.
SkipEffect
Represents the effect of a "SKIP" card in the UNO game.
Table
Represents the table in the Uno game where cards are played.
ThreadCheckGameOver
A background thread that continuously checks if either player has won the UNO game by running out of cards.
ThreadPlayMachine
Thread responsible for managing the machine player's turn in the UNO game.
ThreadSingUNOMachine
Runnable thread that periodically checks if the human player has only one card left, simulating the "UNO" call in the game.
WelcomeController
Controller for the welcome screen of the UNO game.
WelcomeStage
Represents the main stage of the Uno game application.
WildEffect
Represents the effect of a "WILD" card in the UNO game.
